Class TetrisPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisPiece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TetrisL1, TetrisL2, TetrisS1, TetrisS2, TetrisSquare, TetrisStick, TetrisT

    public abstract class TetrisPiece
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean[][][] pieceMatrix
      3 dimensional array maintaining which squares are filled first dimension is rotation (index 0: 0 degrees, index 1: 90 degrees, index 2: 180 degrees, index 3: 270 degrees) second and third dimensions create 4x4 grid with true values indicating filled squares
      protected int rotation
      Maintains the current rotation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TetrisPiece() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean[][] getPieceRotation()
      Get the rotation of this piece
      boolean isFilled(int rot, int row, int col)
      Checks if there is a TetrisBlock at the (row, col) position for the rotation rot, where rot is 0, 90, 180 or 270 degrees
      protected void rotateCCW()
      Rotate the piece counter-clockwise by 90 degrees.
      protected void rotateCW()
      Rotate the piece clockwise by 90 degrees.
      protected abstract void setRotation() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • pieceMatrix

        protected boolean[][][] pieceMatrix
        3 dimensional array maintaining which squares are filled first dimension is rotation (index 0: 0 degrees, index 1: 90 degrees, index 2: 180 degrees, index 3: 270 degrees) second and third dimensions create 4x4 grid with true values indicating filled squares

      • rotation

        protected int rotation
        Maintains the current rotation. 0: 0 degrees, 1: 90 degrees, 2: 180 degrees, 3: 270 degrees

        public boolean[][] getPieceRotation()
        Get the rotation of this piece

      • isFilled

        public boolean isFilled(int rot,
                        int row,
                        int col)
        Checks if there is a TetrisBlock at the (row, col) position for the rotation rot, where rot is 0, 90, 180 or 270 degrees
